author: nash
msg: TUSCANY-3789: Define project.build.sourceEncoding property in top-level pom.xml

author: aconway
msg: The Timer code logs a warning if a timer callback is started late or
overruns the start time for the next callback. In cases where there
are a lot of these warnings, the time taken to do the logging itself
This commit aggregates timer warnings and give a statistical report

author: cmpilato
msg: (get_lock): Tweak error message to not suggested using an external
locking mechanism (which isn't supported in svnrdump).

author: cmpilato
msg: For issue #3716 ("svnrdump does not support cancellation"): Don't
leave a lock behind when 'svnrdump load' is cancelled.
(drive_dumpstream_loader): Use maybe_unlock() to avoid leaving locks
